name: [enter name here]
description:
A game by Add3Mana for our team enterprise module.

In [enter name here] you'll defend your kingdom from the horrid invading masses of monsters. With the use of various elemental effects in conjunction with each other, you too will control the battlefield unleasing powerful elemental combinations, which can vastly change the tide of battle in your favor!

Controls:

  • ESC - Brings up the pause menu, stopping the game while you look over our settings, or allowing you to exit the game.
  • Clicking - Most of the game can be interacted with via the mouse click button, the player is able to build towers via hovering over the various outlinned tower pad around the map, then by choosing which tower from the right hand side it will buy it using the players gained gold.

Tutorial

You'll start with a base amount of gold which you can use to buy some defenses for the incoming hordes, once you've gotten the handle on protecting yourself it'll be time to look into upgrading your pre-existing towers and battlements. In order for you to loose, the enemies will have to make it right to the end of the 

 - Ice Tower: Fires snow balls towards enemies within range, enemies hit with it's projectiles are slowed for a time before speeding back up to normal.
- Strong against fire related enemies.
- Fire Tower: Fires fast moving fireballs towards enemies within it's range.
- Strong against smaller foes.
